actions.description: The nimblewright makes three attacks: two with its rapier and one with its dagger.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

languages: understands one language known to its creator but can't speak
name: Nimblewright
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The nimblewright has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The nimblewright's weapon attacks are magical.
specialTraits.name: Magic Weapons

specialTraits.description: As long as it has at least 1 hit point remaining, the nimblewright regains 1 hit point when a mending spell is cast on it.
specialTraits.name: Repairable

specialTraits.description: The nimblewright has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
specialTraits.name: Sure-Footed
